statements: SELECT * FROM chat_history;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM chat_history WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM chat_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_history WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND sender_id = 3;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_history GROUP BY sender_id HAVING message_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM chat_history ORDER BY message_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_history WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM chat_history WHERE receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM chat_history WHERE sender_id = 3 AND receiver_id = 4
SELECT message_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM chat_history WHERE message_text LIKE '%hello%'
SELECT * FROM chat_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM chat_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_content, sent_at FROM chat_messages ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) as message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id;
SELECT username, last_active FROM chat_users WHERE last_active > '2022-01-01' AND username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM chat_users WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, last_active FROM chat_users WHERE last_active >= '2022-01-01' AND last_active < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY last_active ASC;
SELECT message_content FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(message_id) AS total_messages FROM chat_messages WHERE sender_id = user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_messages > 10;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, MAX(sent_at) AS latest_message_sent_at FROM chat_messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id ORDER BY latest_message_sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatUsers;
SELECT username, phone_number FROM ChatUsers WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM ChatUsers ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatMessages WHERE sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT group_name, created_at FROM ChatGroups ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM ChatUsers WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM ChatUsers WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_text FROM ChatMessages WHERE sent_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ChatGroups WHERE created_at < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY group_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, group_id FROM ChatGroups WHERE group_name LIKE 'Tech%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_users;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM chat_rooms;
SELECT message_id, user_id, message_text FROM chat_messages WHERE room_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, contact_name FROM chat_contacts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT room_id, COUNT(message_id) AS message_count FROM chat_messages GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT * FROM chat_users;
SELECT room_name, room_id FROM chat_rooms WHERE room_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM chat_messages WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, contact_name FROM chat_contacts WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' AND contact_name LIKE '%Jane%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages, room_id FROM chat_messages GROUP BY room_id HAVING total_messages > 10 ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT * FROM ChatUsers WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM ChatUsers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ChatMessages WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM ChatGroups WHERE created_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_text, attachment_url FROM ChatMessages INNER JOIN ChatAttachments ON ChatMessages.message_id = ChatAttachments.message_id WHERE attachment_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM ChatUsers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM ChatUsers WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM ChatGroups WHERE created_date < NOW();
SELECT message_text, message_timestamp FROM ChatMessages WHERE sender_id = 5 ORDER BY message_timestamp DESC;
SELECT attachment_url FROM ChatAttachments WHERE attachment_type = 'image' LIMIT 10;
